title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning including supervised and unsupervised learning, regression, classification, and clustering algorithms.

title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Master deep neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and transformers. Build and train models for computer vision, NLP, and sequence modeling.

title: Natural Language Processing with Transformers
description: Deep dive into NLP using state-of-the-art transformer models including BERT, GPT, and T5 for text classification, generation, and understanding.

title: Computer Vision Fundamentals
description: Learn image processing, object detection, segmentation, and recognition using CNNs and modern architectures like ResNet and YOLO.

title: Reinforcement Learning
description: Master reinforcement learning algorithms including Q-Learning, Policy Gradients, Actor-Critic methods, and Deep RL applications.

title: MLOps: Machine Learning Operations
description: Learn to deploy, monitor, and maintain ML models in production. Cover CI/CD for ML, model versioning, and MLOps best practices.

title: Python for Data Science and AI
description: Master Python programming for data science including NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn for data analysis and ML.

title: Generative AI and Large Language Models
description: Explore generative AI, fine-tuning LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG systems, and building AI applications with GPT and other models.

title: Mathematics for Machine Learning
description: Build strong mathematical foundations covering linear algebra, calculus, probability, and statistics essential for ML.

title: TensorFlow Developer Certificate
description: Comprehensive TensorFlow training covering neural networks, CNNs, NLP, and time series with hands-on projects.

title: PyTorch for Deep Learning
description: Master PyTorch framework for building and training deep learning models with dynamic computation graphs.

title: AI Ethics and Responsible AI
description: Understand ethical considerations in AI development including bias, fairness, transparency, and privacy in ML systems.

title: Time Series Forecasting
description: Learn time series analysis and forecasting using statistical methods, ARIMA, and deep learning approaches like LSTMs.

title: Graph Neural Networks
description: Explore graph-based deep learning including GCNs, GraphSAGE, and GATs for node classification and link prediction.

title: AI for Healthcare
description: Apply machine learning to healthcare problems including medical imaging, patient data analysis, and clinical decision support.

title: Feature Engineering for Machine Learning
description: Master techniques for creating, selecting, and transforming features to improve ML model performance.

title: AutoML and Neural Architecture Search
description: Learn automated machine learning techniques, hyperparameter tuning, and neural architecture search methods.

title: Edge AI and Model Optimization
description: Deploy AI models on edge devices with techniques for model compression, quantization, and optimization.

title: Recommendation Systems
description: Build recommendation engines using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and deep learning approaches.

title: MLOps with AWS
description: Learn to build, deploy, and manage ML pipelines on AWS using SageMaker, Lambda, and other AWS services.
